me wana wita shri lankawa abhiyoga rasak madhyaye sanwardhana ilakka sapuramin sarthaka gamanaka niratha we.koti thrasthawadin wisin pasugiya wasara 30kata adhika kalayak thisse winasha karana lada uthuru - nangenahira palath da sanwardhanaya karamin ee palathwala awathan wu mahajanathawa yali padinchi karamin ratak hatiyata deshiyawa ha wideshiyawa paminena siyalu abhiyoga jaya ganimin gaman ganna mema gamana sabawinma suwisheshi wanne ya.antharjathika aarakshawa sahathika kirimata eksath jathinge sanwidhanayata balaya labi thibiyadith ratawal kihipayaka polis karyaya lokayata awashya nowana bawa 68 weni maha samuluwe di shri lanka janadhipathiwaraya penwa dun karunu kerehi da lokaye boho ratawala awadhanaya yomu wi thibuni.“shri lanka janadhipathiwaraya eksath jathinge maha mandalaya amathana sama witaka dima lokaye bahutharayak ratawal muhunapana gatalu ha eeta laba diya yuthu prayogika wisandum itha kadimata wigraha karanawa” yanuwen jathyanthara madhya kihipayakama shri lanka janadhipathiwarayage kathawa wartha kara thibuni.
